projectId.description: Id of translation project in phrase

sourceKeyTransformer.description: path to file containing function to transform keys extracted from source into comparable state

phraseKeyTransformer.description: path to file containing function to transform keys downlaaded from phrase into comparable state

sourceKeyFilter.description: path to file containing function to filter keys extracted from source

phraseKeyFilter.description: path to file containing function to filter keys downlaaded from phrase
